text: “Inappropriate and unwelcome is probably my most favorite way of disrupting harassment as it’s happening,” she opens the video. Judd then gives viewers an example of what she means by reenacting an imagined (but very real) scenario in which she addresses street hecklers. “Inappropriate and unwelcome!” she shouts, while turning to address the harassers.
